attributes.action: Stop the proposed closure of Newport D.O.(Shropshire) and the move to Telford of 28 staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail plans to close Newport Delivery Office in Shropshire and move lock stock and barrel to Oakengates D.O in Telford. This will include all staff and all mail deliveries/ collections for the TF10 postcode area, including Edgmond, Sambrook, Lilleshall, Tibberton, Weston Jones, Moreton, Great Chatwell,and all other surrounding villages. Do we need this? NO we dont! Open a new premises on the industrial estate in Newport, keep the office in Newport, but do not move it to Telford.
